name: Nevertales: Smoke and Mirrors - A Hidden Objects Storybook Adventure (Full)
name_original: Nevertales: Smoke and Mirrors - A Hidden Objects Storybook Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Your father’s been arrested for treason and your mother is missing. Now you’re the only one who can free Taleworld!

• FREE THE STORYBOOK WORLD!
Alice belongs to two worlds: the real one where she’s following her dream to become the head of a company, and the storybook realm of Taleworld where she was born.

• STAND AGAINST THE TYRANNY IN TALEWORLD
These two worlds collide when her owl friend Gears returns with an urgent message. Her father has been arrested by the Queen of Hearts and will be executed for treason!

• BRIDGE THE WORLDS AND BEAT THE ODDS
Use Alice’s unique mirror powers to travel between worlds and help defeat the Queen! Enjoy charming storybook puzzles and intriguing hidden object scenes.

• FIND THE EDELWEISS FLOWER IN THE BONUS GAME
Unlock special wallpapers earned as you play and find a hidden collectible in every scene to unlock bonus content! Enjoy various extras to remember your journey through Taleworld.
